titleStmt.title: By the King an abstract of His Maiesties letters patents, bearing date the nineteenth day of December, in the one and twentieth yeere of His Maiesties reigne of England, France and Ireland, and of Scotland the seuen and fiftieth, containing a declaration of His Maiesties pleasure for confirming of former letters patents, granted to Matthew de Questor Esquier, and Matthew de Questor his sonne, of the office of postmaster for forraine parts.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

notesStmt.note: Confirming Mathew de Questor, postmaster for foreign posts.
Reprint of second paragraph of STC 8716.
"Witnesse Our Selfe at Westminster, the nineteenth day of December, in the one and twentieth yeere of Our Reigne of England, France and Ireland, and of Scotland the seuen and fiftieth."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
